channel.title: Yukonwoodcraft - Cabinet making & custom furniture
channel.description: Recent content on Yukonwoodcraft - Cabinet making & custom furniture

item.title: Maple Standing Desks
item.description: For this client 5 standing desks for an office were created. The desks feature solid maple veneer tops. The veneers were cut from solid maple blanks to match the grain for each desk. The table tops were mounted on height adjustable bases which makes it possible to use the desk in a standing as well as sitting position.

item.title: Day Care Vanity
item.description: This project entailed building a vanity for a daycare. The vanity is a scaled down version of a regular vanity. It features a step to allow the kids to use the sink comfortably (due to the way the plumbing in the building was set up it was not possible to lower the vanity even further). The doors of the vanity feature 3D printed decals to fit into a daycare environment.

item.title: Book Shelf
item.description: This client requested a book shelf that complemented the wood accents and design of their house. The shelf was made from fir wood and finished with an natural wax/oil finish.

item.title: Couch Table
item.description: For this project a multi-mode couch table was designed and built. The table is made from solid birch wood. The tapered legs are attached via hand cut joinery. The table can be used in 2 different ways. First in a regular horizontal way and secondly in a vertical position where the legs slide under the couch offering a surface to place i.e. drinks.

item.title: Blanket Chest
item.description: For this client a fir blanket chest was designed and fabricated. The chest features box joinery and a simple modern design. A oil/wax finish has been applied to preserve the natural wood look.

item.title: Kitchen Island
item.description: For this project a custom kitchen island was created. The kitchen island features an extra wide counter top with built in downdraft range as well as 2 book shelves on the backside of the island.

item.title: Kitchen Shelves
item.description: For this project a set of 4 fir floating kitchen shelves was created and installed.

item.title: Recessed wall cabinet
item.description: For this client a cabinet was created that is recessed in the wall. The cabinet is made of birch plywood and fir.

item.title: Picnic Tables
item.description: For this project a set of 2 matching picnic tables was created from Cedar wood.

item.title: Bathroom Driftwood Shelf & Towel Rack
item.description: This project entailed designing and installing custom mounting solutions for 2 pieces of driftwood to create a basic shelf and a towel rack for a bathroom.

item.title: Park Benches
item.description: For this project a set of 9 matching park benches were created from Cedar wood.

item.title: Sauna Door with Window and Vents
item.description: This project entailed creating a custom size sauna door and frame. The sauna door features 2 closable vents as well as a window.

item.title: Shoe Shelf with hidden Drawer
item.description: For this project a custom shoe shelf was created that utilizes an existing nook in the wall. The shelf can slide out to reveal a hidden drawer to store additional shoes. The drawer can be resized to account for seasonal footwear size differences.

item.title: Toy Chest
item.description: For this project a toy chest with a removable storage compartment was created. The chest can store large items as well as organize lots of smaller items.

item.title: Nook Table for Plants
item.description: For this project a custom table for plants was created. The table was made to fit into an existing corner nook in the clients house.

item.title: Truck Camper
item.description: For this project a custom truck bed storage solution was build. The solution consists of 10 individual boxes that form a sleeping platform when combined. The setup features 2 large drawers with individual compartments as well as several other compartments that can be accessed from the top.

item.title: Doll House
item.description: For this project a custom doll house was created. The house is mounted on a custom base with tapered legs to allow it to be used free standing.
